overview:
Ed is a hands on CFO, with experience in traditional and Internet technology companies.

Ed has over 20 years of financial experience and brings to Fundster, Inc. a well rounded diversified background which includes certified accountant services in the private sector and provision of such expertise to a billion dollar public company. Ed has held many high level managerial positions in the technology industry which include Chief Financial Officer of Quick Quote, Vice President of Operations/Finance for International Software Solutions and President of 2020 Vision Source, an internet employment service specializing in the optical industry. He has also held high level managerial positions for such broad-based companies as ADT, JM Family and Dycom Industries. Ed earned his B.A degree from Flagler College in St. Augustine, FL in 1988. He earned his CPA in 1992.
